text: Absolutely thrilled to see nine talented physicians from UAMS recognized as Healthcare Research All-Stars! Their groundbreaking work in hip and knee surgery, orthopaedics, and gastrointestinal & general surgery is truly commendable. This achievement not only highlights their dedication to healing but also underscores the vital role of government-funded research in driving medical progress. Bravo to these trailblazers and UAMS for fostering an environment that celebrates innovation, inclusivity, and social equality. #ProgressiveChange #HealthcareHeroes ðŸ’ªðŸ©ºðŸŽ‰
